alert.note: Alert for Blaine (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:10PM MDT until July 06 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Blaine County in north central Montana... * Until 545 PM MDT. * At 510 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hays, or near Zortman, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Hays and Lodge Pole. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
